de.mbrero.see.parser

Class AbstractParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mbrero.see.parser.AbstractParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnnotationParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CRAFTParser, CTakesParser, MetaMapParser, QuickUmlsParser

    public abstract class AbstractParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAnnotationParser
    Parses the content of the result xml generated by a annotation run.
    Since the results file may differ from extractor to extractor, this class will
    be extended by specific classes dealing with the specific structures of the extractor's output,
    Author:
    massimiliano.brero@studium.fernuni-hagen.de

      • PROTOTYPE_ONTOLOGY

        protected final java.lang.String PROTOTYPE_ONTOLOGY
        The ontology used for the prototype of this software. To get the used ontology dynamically from the MRCONSO.RFF file of
        a UMLS installation use ParserHelper.getOntologyForCui(String). Beware the extraction from the usually big files is quite expensive.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • annotations

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Annotation>> annotations
        All annotations for every parsed result file. Structure Annotation:
          [document_id]
        • [cui 1] -> Annotation object
        • [cui 1] -> Annotation object
        • ...
            • [document_id]
          • [cui 2] -> Annotation object
          • [cui 1] -> Annotation object
          • ...

      • parse

        public void parse(java.io.File source)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs through the result xml file to find the tags containing the UMLS concept information. If the path is pointing to a directory, all files in this folder will be parsed automatically. If no annotations could be extracted from the file, we insert an "empty" annotation. This way later evaluation tools won't omit this file.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface IAnnotationParser
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        getEmptyAnnotation()
